chronic_diseases.name: Diabetes
chronic_diseases.description: A chronic condition where the body is unable to properly regulate blood sugar levels.
solutions: Maintain a healthy diet with a focus on low-glycemic foods
Engage in regular physical activity and exercise
Monitor blood sugar levels regularly and take prescribed medications
Manage stress and get sufficient sleep

chronic_diseases.name: Hypertension (High Blood Pressure)
chronic_diseases.description: A chronic condition where the blood pressure is consistently elevated, putting strain on the cardiovascular system.
solutions: Adopt a low-sodium, heart-healthy diet
Engage in regular aerobic exercise
Manage stress through relaxation techniques
Take prescribed blood pressure medications as directed

chronic_diseases.name: Obesity
chronic_diseases.description: A chronic condition characterized by excessive accumulation of body fat, often leading to other health problems.
solutions: Implement a balanced, calorie-controlled diet with a focus on nutritious foods
Engage in regular physical activity and exercise
Seek support from a healthcare professional or weight management program
Address underlying factors, such as stress or mental health issues

chronic_diseases.name: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
chronic_diseases.description: A group of progressive lung diseases that make it difficult to breathe, often caused by smoking.
solutions: Quit smoking and avoid exposure to secondhand smoke
Engage in pulmonary rehabilitation exercises
Use prescribed bronchodilators and other medications as directed
Maintain a healthy diet and stay hydrated

chronic_diseases.name: Heart Disease
chronic_diseases.description: A range of conditions that affect the heart's structure and function, often leading to cardiovascular problems.
solutions: Adopt a heart-healthy diet low in saturated and trans fats
Engage in regular cardiovascular exercise
Manage risk factors such as high cholesterol, high blood pressure, and diabetes
Take prescribed medications to support heart health
